controllers

Class GasStationManagerIncomeReports

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.GasStationManagerIncomeReports
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class GasStationManagerIncomeReports
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    this class is a controller for GasStationManagerIncomeReports.fxml brings data from DB myfuel.purchases where we have all the items the station sold to clients incomeTable is the table where we display all products and total amount that we sold for 3 months getStationName function sets the String stationName to the name of the station where the manager works at labelMonths is for displaying at the fxml file the current quarter we are working with

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GasStationManagerIncomeReports() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getDate()
      getData function checks the date stores the month (int) in variable n station manager can generate all reports only at the end of every quarter for example ,at the start of April 1/4 or 1/7 or 1/10 or 1/1 initialize function sets the month label according to getData Initialize the n variable to 7 so the reports work properly as if today is 1/7 and we can generate reports of april to june
      void getStationName() 
      void initialize(java.net.URL arg0, java.util.ResourceBundle arg1) 
      void refreshIncomeTableAprilToJune()
      refreshIncome functions get the relevant data from DB to the page all income for the specific quarter is displayed for the user total income is calculated for every month in that quarter and every product the station sold
      void refreshIncomeTableJanToMarch() 
      void refreshIncomeTableJulyToSep() 
      void refreshIncomeTableOctToDec()

                       java.util.ResourceBundle arg1)
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

      • getDate

        public void getDate()
        getData function checks the date stores the month (int) in variable n station manager can generate all reports only at the end of every quarter for example ,at the start of April 1/4 or 1/7 or 1/10 or 1/1 initialize function sets the month label according to getData Initialize the n variable to 7 so the reports work properly as if today is 1/7 and we can generate reports of april to june

      • refreshIncomeTableAprilToJune

        public void refreshIncomeTableAprilToJune()
        refreshIncome functions get the relevant data from DB to the page all income for the specific quarter is displayed for the user total income is calculated for every month in that quarter and every product the station sold
